message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $8,000 to us, and we believe it's equally valuable to you. Considering its quality and benefits, we're willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $7,200.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6,500 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, we've decided to counter your offer with a price of $6,800 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6,600 for the product.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. We've reviewed your proposal and decided to counter with an offer of $6,700 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet my needs. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6,650 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to counter with a price of $6,675 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6,650 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After reviewing your proposal, we've decided to counter with a price of $6,660 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $6,640 for the product.
